description.p: A humanoid cursed with the savage and terrifying power of lycanthropy. Werewolves can shift between humanoid, wolf, and hybrid forms.
Shapechanger. You can use your action to polymorph into a wolf-humanoid hybrid or into a wolf, or back into your true form. Equipment does not transform. You revert if you die.
Keen Hearing and Smell. Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.
Damage Immunities. You are immune to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons.
Languages. Common (cannot speak in wolf form).
You can shift into wolf or hybrid form. Statistics remain the same except AC. Equipment does not transform.
